name: Leset die Asuw! LCCN2004665853 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Leset die Asuw! Abstract: Poster shows a smiling soldier reading a newspaper while sitting on top of a cannon. Fireworks(?) and trees are in the background. Text urges people to read the "Aus Sundgau und Wasgenwald" (Asuw), an army newspaper, and gives ordering information. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 54 x 43 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Rudolf Eberle.; Title from item.
